name: TwinWave
description: A threat analysis platform to reduce the friction of repetitive manual tasks typically associated with investigating threats.

since.description: Start of time range stated in hours
since.verbose: If not specified, the default is past 3 days

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to.

start_time.description: Start of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
start_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is past 10 days

end_time.description: End of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
end_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is now

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for.

artifact_count.description: Maximum number of artifact records to query for.

actions.description: Get the consolidated forensics for a completed job

job_id.description: job id of the forensics you want pulled

wait.description: wait for job to finish before returning results

timeout.description: maximum time (in minutes) to wait for job to be complete

job_id.description: job id of the job summary you want to fetch

wait.description: wait for job to finish before returning results

timeout.description: maximum time (in minutes) to wait for job to be complete

actions.description: Get the PDF report for a completed job

job_id.description: job id of the job summary you want to download the PDF for

wait.description: wait for job to finish before returning results

timeout.description: maximum time (in minutes) to wait for job to be complete

actions.description: Get screenshots for the specified job and store them in the vault

job_id.description: job id of the job summary you want to download the PDF for

wait.description: wait for job to finish before returning results

timeout.description: maximum time (in minutes) to wait for job to be complete
